post_message: While protests in Atlanta and around the country have been peaceful, that isn't the case for all. Now a major city's officials are saying that enough is enough.  “If you’re upset with the election, please don’t come out and protest,” the city's police chief said. “We are done with criminal activity in this city. It’s time to move on and to move forward.”
